duties_responsibilities.duty: Well-versed on all menu items and able to produce consistent and quality dishes in fast-paced and demanding environments on all stations.
Assist with inventory to support the kitchen operating at a sustainable food cost.
Watch wastage, cooking temps, and quality to reduce additional costs, and influence others on the cost of product and its contribution to the profit and loss of the company.
Production and a-la-carte dish(s) execution, including weekend feast ideas and family meal.
Delegate tasks as needed and ensure proper procedure is followed when clocking in and out for shifts as well as breaks.
Support Executive Sous and Jr. Sous with end of service meeting.
Maintain company target goals and consistent experience for Soho House Standards for service; 3-8-10.
Positive influence for teams under pressure and provide a welcoming work environment that increases staff morale.
Attend “Cook House” trainings and support the mentoring and education of new and existing team members on areas they are looking to grow.
Be flexible on whatever duties or tasks you are asked to perform and be available to help and collaborate with other stations if requested or needed.
Complete any additional tasks as deemed business appropriate by management.
